alert.note: Alert for Adams; Allen; Huntington; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:25AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Allen, northeastern Huntington, eastern Wells, Adams and west central Van Wert Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 423 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Wayne to 9 miles northeast of Huntington. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ossian around 440 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Bluffton, Decatur, Monroe and Berne. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 between mile markers 0 and 17. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 291 and 307. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for northeastern Indiana...and west central Ohio.
